Dear Ms. Overall:
Your Child Care Institution certificate of approval license is renewed. It is valid only at
your present address and is nontransferable. If you move, please notify us at least 30
days in advance.
You will be receiving the certificate of approval in the mail. Please review it for accuracy.
OR
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
(date). The study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing
statutes and rules, sections of the contract and Modified Settlement Agreement (MSA)
requirements. It should be noted that violations of any licensing rules are also violations
of the MSA and your contract. As indicated above substantial compliance has been
established therefore, your certificate of approval license is renewed.
OR
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
(date). You have submitted an acceptable written corrective action plan covering the
violations cited in the report. It should be noted that violations of any licensing statutes
and rules are also violations of the MSA and your contract. Your certificate of
approvallicense is renewed.
OR
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
(date). Due to the violations, a written corrective action plan is required. It should be
noted that violations of any licensing statutes rules and are also violations of the MSA
and your contract. The corrective action plan is due 15 days from the date of this letter
and must include the following:
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov  (517) 335-1980

 How compliance with each citation will be achieved.
 Who is directly responsible for implementing the corrective action for each
licensing statute and rule or section of the contract or MSA citation.
 Specific time frames for each citation as to when the correction will be
completed or implemented.
 How continuing compliance will be maintained once compliance is
achieved.
 The signature of the responsible party and a date.
Upon receipt of an acceptable corrective action plan, a regular certificate of approval
license will be issued. If you fail to submit an acceptable corrective action plan,
disciplinary action will result.
OR
Upon receipt of an acceptable corrective action plan, a six-month provisional certificate
of approval will be issued. If you do not agree to a provisional certificate of approval or
fail to submit an acceptable corrective action plan, disciplinary action will result.
OR
Attached is the Renewal inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
(date). The study has determined substantial violations of applicable licensing statutes
and rules and/or MSA requirements and/or contract policies. It should be noted that
violations of any licensing rules are also violations of the MSA and your contract. Refusal
to renew the certificate of approval license is recommended. You will be notified in writing
of the Agency’s intention and your options for resolution of this matter.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (248) 975-5053.
Sincerely,
James B. Gale, Licensing Consultant
